pages.text: $(li)Patterns can be used to customize your $(l:patchouli:decoration/vanilla/banners)$(l:patchouli:decoration/vanilla/banners)Banners$(/l)$(/l), $(l:patchouli:decoration/supplementaries/flag)$(l:patchouli:decoration/supplementaries/flag)Flags$(/l)$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:armors/elytra)$(l:patchouli:armors/elytra)Elytras$(/l)$(/l).$(br)$(li)To apply a Pattern in one of those items, you will need a Pattern, a Dye and the Loom.$(br)$(li)The Loom is used to apply Patterns on $(l:patchouli:decoration/vanilla/banners)$(l:patchouli:decoration/vanilla/banners)Banners$(/l)$(/l), $(l:patchouli:decoration/supplementaries/flag)$(l:patchouli:decoration/supplementaries/flag)Flags$(/l)$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:armors/elytra)$(l:patchouli:armors/elytra)Elytras$(/l)$(/l).
pages.title: Patterns

pages.text: $(li)First, right click the Loom to open a new GUI.$(br)$(li)Now, insert the Pattern, Dye and the item to customize.$(br)$(li)Finally take the item generated in the output slot.

$(li)A Pattern of a Daisy which can be used to customize your $(l:patchouli:armors/elytra)Elytras$(/l), $(l:patchouli:decoration/vanilla/banners)Banners$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:decoration/supplementaries/flag)Flags$(/l).
pages.title: Pattern Flower Charge

pages.text: $(li)A Pattern of a Creeper which can be used to customize your $(l:patchouli:armors/elytra)Elytras$(/l), $(l:patchouli:decoration/vanilla/banners)Banners$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:decoration/supplementaries/flag)Flags$(/l).
pages.title: Pattern Creeper Ch...

pages.text: $(li)A Pattern of a Cube Shaped Earth which can be used to customize your $(l:patchouli:armors/elytra)Elytras$(/l), $(l:patchouli:decoration/vanilla/banners)Banners$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:decoration/supplementaries/flag)Flags$(/l).$(br)$(li)It can be traded with a $(l:patchouli:villagers/cartographer)Cartographer$(/l).
pages.title: Pattern Globe

pages.text: $(li)A Pattern of Piglin Snout which can be used to customize your $(l:patchouli:armors/elytra)Elytras$(/l), $(l:patchouli:decoration/vanilla/banners)Banners$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:decoration/supplementaries/flag)Flags$(/l).$(br)$(li)It can be found in the $(l:patchouli:perks/loot_chest)Loot Chests$(/l) in the $(l:patchouli:structures/bastion_remnant)Bastion Remnants$(/l).
pages.title: Pattern Snout
